email.password_reset.title: Password Reset Request
email.password_reset.intro: We received a request to reset your password. If you didn't make this request, you can safely ignore this email.
email.password_reset.instructions: To reset your password, click the button below:
email.password_reset.outro: This password reset link will expire in 24 hours.
email.password_reset.warning: If you're having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste the URL into your web browser.
